rules_text:
Reach, vigilance
When Certhin Ranger enters, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.
[i]Metalcraft[/i] – {T}: Certhin Ranger deals damage equal to its power to any target. Activate this ability only if you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: [i]Certhin is guarded by a elite troop of constructs said to be forged by Varyus[/i]
